channel.title: üè¢ Xi'an Jiaotong University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Xi'an Jiaotong University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: ColJailBreak: Collaborative Generation and Editing for Jailbreaking Text-to-Image Deep Generation
item.description: ColJailBreak cleverly circumvents AI safety filters by first generating safe images and then subtly injecting unsafe content using image editing.

item.title: Concentrate Attention: Towards Domain-Generalizable Prompt Optimization for Language Models
item.description: Boost language model performance across domains with ‘Concentration’: a new prompt optimization objective that prioritizes stable, deep-layer attention.

item.title: Flipped Classroom: Aligning Teacher Attention with Student in Generalized Category Discovery
item.description: FlipClass dynamically updates the teacher model in a teacher-student framework to align with the student’s attention, resolving learning inconsistencies and significantly improving generalized categor…

item.title: IPM-LSTM: A Learning-Based Interior Point Method for Solving Nonlinear Programs
item.description: IPM-LSTM accelerates nonlinear program solving by up to 70% using LSTM networks to approximate linear system solutions within the interior point method.

item.title: Learning 3D Equivariant Implicit Function with Patch-Level Pose-Invariant Representation
item.description: 3D surface reconstruction revolutionized: PEIF leverages patch-level pose-invariant representations and 3D patch-level equivariance for state-of-the-art accuracy, even with varied poses and datasets!

item.title: Look, Listen, and Answer: Overcoming Biases for Audio-Visual Question Answering
item.description: New dataset MUSIC-AVQA-R and a multi-faceted cycle collaborative debiasing strategy significantly improve audio-visual question answering robustness.

item.title: Measuring Mutual Policy Divergence for Multi-Agent Sequential Exploration
item.description: MADPO, a novel MARL framework, uses mutual policy divergence maximization with conditional Cauchy-Schwarz divergence to enhance exploration and agent heterogeneity in sequential updating, outperformin…

item.title: Neural P$^3$M: A Long-Range Interaction Modeling Enhancer for Geometric GNNs
item.description: Neural P¬≥M enhances geometric GNNs by incorporating mesh points to model long-range interactions in molecules, achieving state-of-the-art accuracy in predicting energy and forces.

item.title: OneActor: Consistent Subject Generation via Cluster-Conditioned Guidance
item.description: OneActor: One-shot tuning for consistent subject image generation, bypassing laborious backbone tuning via semantic guidance, achieving 4x faster speed.

item.title: Prompt-Agnostic Adversarial Perturbation for Customized Diffusion Models
item.description: Prompt-Agnostic Adversarial Perturbation (PAP) defends customized diffusion models against image tampering, achieving superior generalization over prompt-specific methods.

item.title: TPR: Topology-Preserving Reservoirs for Generalized Zero-Shot Learning
item.description: Topology-Preserving Reservoirs (TPR) enhances CLIP’s zero-shot learning by using a dual-space alignment and a topology-preserving objective to improve generalization to unseen classes, achieving state…
